PersonalStatement.text: Samantha Levine, born on 1972-12-29, is a Male based in Paceside, Congo. He is Married and holds Singaporean nationality. Currently working at Thomas-Smith.

WorkExperience.text: Project Manager at Smith, Fisher and Smith from 2005 to 2019.
Senior Project Manager at Thomas-Smith, 2021 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from Shenzhen University
Master's in Engineering from USI - Università della Svizzera italiana

PersonalSkills.text: Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys playing tennis.
